item.title: A Moss Snake Kicks You for 4 ^H^H^H^H^H
item.description: Today we look at the most recent patch of Everquest, pontificate more on the Combine server, and mourn the loss of Everquest's greatest bug.

item.title: The Dangers of Progression, The Serpent's Spine, SOE's Vanguard
item.description: This week Loral takes a look at the news surrounding the Progression server, the rumored name of the next expansion, and SOE's co-publication of Vanguard.

item.title: Five Recommended Improvements to Prophecy of Ro
item.description: Today Loral Ciriclight looks at five ways to improve the latest Everquest expansion, Prophecy of Ro.

item.title: Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire Final Report
item.description: Today Loral reviews and organizes all of the news gathered in Atlanta Georgia at the Everquest Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire.

item.title: Notes from the Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire
item.description: Loral begins his living journal with notes from the Everquest Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire. Watch often for frequent updates. Update: first details of the next expansion, newso on a new "non-classic" classic server, discussions of death and downtime.

item.title: Loral's Evil Agenda, Spring 2006
item.description: With an Everquest Community Summit and Fan Faire just a week away, Loral takes a look at the full scope of the game to pick out the five improvements that may have the greatest impact to Everquest.

item.title: Evil Agenda Report Card
item.description: With the April 2006 Fan Faire soon arriving, so too comes a new Evil Agenda. Before we lay out this season's recommendations, Mobhunter takes a look at the Evil Agendas of the past and grades SOE on the changes it has made so far.

item.title: The Rise of Ro and the Fall of Stormhammer
item.description: This week we look at the parlay on the test server, the post-release Prophecy whispers, and the long-awaited discussion of the fall of Stormhammer.

item.title: As the Prophecy Unfolds
item.description: With the dawn of the Prophecy of Ro at hand, Loral takes a look at Prophecy single-group quest to reach the Theater of Blood and also looks at some of the armor rewards from the 11th Everquest expansion.

item.title: Prophecy of Ro: In-Depth Preview
item.description: With the release of Prophecy of Ro only three weeks away, Loral Ciriclight spends some time digging into some exclusive details of this new expansion.

item.title: The Rollback of January 2006
item.description: Last week Everquest faced one of the most dramatic events in Norrath's history. Today, Loral Ciriclight, cuts through the rumors and speculation to dig into the truth of the Great Rollback of January 2006.

item.title: Further Prophecies and the Everquest Expansion Release Cycle
item.description: In today's article Loral talks about the recent Everquest and Prophecy of Ro news and then digs in to a popular and controvercial topic: the Everquest expansion release cycle.

item.title: Expansion Announcement: Prophecy of Ro
item.description: Today SOE announces the eleventh Everquest expansion: Prophecy of Ro. In this article we look at the announced features, some juicy screenshots, and ponder the future with what little information we have.

item.title: Titanium Prophecies
item.description: Today we discuss the release of EQ Players, the leak of Prophecy of Ro, the announcement of Everquest Titanium, the most recent Everquest patch, the progress of Depths of Darkhollow, and John Smedley's interview on the state of massive online games.

item.title: Interview with Prathun on Everquest Raids
item.description: Today we have a Mobhunter Exclusive interview with Prathun, the lead Everquest raid designer and most experienced raid designer in the world for massive online games.
